vlive.korean: [(미안함에 음소거 미소)] 소 잃고 외양간을 잃으면 뭘 얻는데? [I'm sorry] What do you get if you lose a cow and a barn? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [I'm sorry] What do you get if you lose a cow and a barn?

vlive.korean: [Q] 엄마가 길을 잃으면? When Mom gets lost? 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO DDOCA] 201710 아스트로 또까
[곰곰] 엄마가 길을 잃으면? When Mom gets lost? 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO DDOCA] 201710 아스트로 또까
딸기가 직장을 잃으면? What if a strawberry loses its job? 듣기 View video V Beauty : [룡이] 요즘 내가 사랑하는 it item
vlive.english: What if a strawberry loses its job?

vlive.korean: 그래? -그래서 운전하다가 길 잃으면... Really? - So if I get lost... 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7의 하드캐리 9화 (GOT7's Hard Carry ep.9)
vlive.english: Really? - So if I get lost...

examples.korean: They could ill afford to lose any more staff. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 더 이상의 직원을 잃으면 곤란했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They could ill afford to lose any more staff. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We’re losing a first-rate editor in Jen. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 젠을 잃으면 일류 편집자를 잃는 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’re losing a first-rate editor in Jen. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Stay close together—I don’t want anyone to get lost. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 계속 꼭 같이 붙어 있어. 아무도 길을 잃으면 안 되니까. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Stay close together—I don’t want anyone to get lost. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I dread to think what will become of them if they lose their home. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들이 집을 잃으면 어떻게 될지 생각하기조차 무섭다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I dread to think what will become of them if they lose their home. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If I lose this job, we can forget about buying a new car. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 이 일[일자리]을 잃으면 우리가 새 차 살 생각은 잊어버려야 할 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If I lose this job, we can forget about buying a new car. Add to Wordbook
